'dzin kyang de tsam mo/ /shes rab kyang de tsam mo/ /rnam par grol ba yang de tsam mo/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de tsam mo/ /sku yang de tsam mo/ /gsung yang de tsam mo/ /thugs kyang
de tsam mo/ /gzugs kyang de tsam mo/ /mtshan kyang de tsam mo/ /de bas na nam mkha' tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med par khong du chud par bya'o zhes bstan to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros
de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das de las bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rang nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba

skyes nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid nas mi snang bar gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul
gyi stobs kyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /nam mkha' mtshungs
shing 'dra ba yi/ /sangs rgyas chos la mi gang zhig /pha rol tu ni 'chi 'tshal ba/ /de ni nyam thag 'gyur ba lags/ /sangs rgyas sku ni blta slad du/ /gang gA bye ba phrag brgya yi/ /bye ma ji
snyed de snyed kyi/ /zhing rnam su ni bdag mchis so/ /de snyed zhing du mchis nas ni/ /pad+ma can gyi zhing du mchis/ /'on kyang khyod kyi dbu gtsug dang / /sku yi tshad kyang ma mthong
lags/ /zhing de na ni 'dren bzhugs pa/ /mtshan ni dpal gyi snying po lags/ /de yis bdag gi bsam mkhyen nas/ /'di skad du ni bka' stsal to/ /la la sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /dpe
dgod ji snyed byed pa ni/ /de dag sangs rgyas mi 'tsham ste/ /de dag rgyal la skur ba 'debs/ /'di la dpe gcig yang dag ste/ /nam mkha'i khams su bstan pa lags/ /de ni sangs rgyas chos
dang 'thun/ /gang na'ang de'i tshad ma mchis/ /nam mkha'i 'di ni ji tsam par/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni tshul khrims dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang rnam grol dang / /rnam grol ye shes mthong de tsam/ /
nam mkha'i tshad ni ji tsam pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyang de tsam ste/ /'jig rten mgon po'i dbu gtsug kyang / /nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa lags/ /nam mkhas ji snyed khyab gyur

pa/ /skus kyang de snyed khyab pa lags/ /sku yis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /'od kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /'od kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /gsung gis kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /gsung gis ji snyed khyab
gyur pa/ /thugs kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /thugs gyis ji snyed khyab gyur ba/ byams pas kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /byams pas ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /ye shes kyis ni de snyed khyab/ /ye shes
ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ /sku yis kyang ni de snyed khyab/ /gang gis byang chub blo bskyed pa/ /de snyed bsod nams khyab par bgyid/ /byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang / /de la gal te gzugs
mchis na/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/ /de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyi bsod nams kyi/ /phung po ji snyed yongs bzung ba/ /de snyed byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /byang
chub sems las rab tu byung / /byang chub sems kyi bsod nams kyi/ /phung po ji snyed brjod pa bas/ /dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin na/ /de bas bsod nams ches mang ngo / /dam chos 'dzin
pa'i bsod nams ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nan tan du/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod mdzad kyang / /mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur ma lags/ /dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa dang / /byang chub sems
kyi bsod nams de/ /stong pa nyid la mos pa yis/ /bcu drug cha yang mi ri lags/ /stong pa nyid la 'dir mos nas/ /byang chub sems kyang mi gtong dang / /dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin
bgyid pa/ /de ni bsod nams sdud pa lags/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/ /chos kyi rtogs pa 'di thos nas/ /de yis byang chub spyad spyod cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan
thob par 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa na/ /zhing rnams bye ba rab tu g.yos/ /lha ni bye ba phrag stong gis/ /rol mo sil snyan bye ba blangs/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni che ba nyid/ /shugs
'chang gis ni bshad thos nas/ /srog chags bye ba phrag stong dag /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa po/ /rang 'byung rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas so/ /gnas
'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /dpag yas bla na ma mchis lags/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o// // bam po bzhi pa/ /
zhi ba'i blo gros de na sems can du ma 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa dag las kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni ma mthong ngo / /de la gang dag gis
mthong ba de dag ni dga' ba skyes nas lta'o/ /gang dag gis ma mthong ba de dag ni cang mi smra bar gyur cing sdod do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhal zas mi gsol mod kyi sems can rnams
kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas gsol bar mthong ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub kyi rim gro pa'i lha gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba dag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
'bring du 'brang zhing de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du zed na sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas kham tshad du blangs te gsol bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pas kham
tshad du blangs pa de yang snod de nyid na 'dug pa de lha de dag gis khyer nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis skye gnas
de dang de dag tu 'phangs pa/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / zas mi rnyed pa/ bkres pas nyam chung bar gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos kyi pham babs de byin nas
sems can de dag gis kyang zas de zos pa dang / bkres skom dang bral te/ bde zhing lus tshim nas bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /gang
dag log par lhung pa yi dags sam gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi nus pa de dag la yang de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros
rnam grangs 'dis na yang khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas mi gsol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zhal zas can du de ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku ni sred med kyi bu ltar mkhregs pa/ sra ba snying po can/ mi shigs pa/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni pho ba dang long ka med do/ /rnag gam/ khrag gam/
mchi ma 'am/ ngar snabs sam/ ngan skyugs sam/ mi gtsang ba med kyi zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gar bu lta bu ste/ khong stong ma yin pa/ bu
ga med pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar lci khyad rdo rje dang 'dra yang 'jam khyad ka tsa li di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i che ba nyid la

ltos zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi tshe gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba na sngon ma reg pa'i reg pa reg nas bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag nyon mongs pa skyed par mi 'gyur ba'i dus de dang tshod de yod do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa gang dag gis
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar shes so/ /zhe sdang la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag byams pa
'thob pa/ gti mug la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag ye shes kyi snang ba 'thob bo/ /cha mnyam pa la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag nyon mongs pa dang bral bar shes so/ /ser
sna can gang dag gis mthong na de dag gtod pa la mos par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag tshul khrims la mos par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sems can
gang dag gis mthong na de dag bzod pa 'thob bo/ /le lo can gang dag gis mthong na de dag brtson 'grus la mos par 'gyur ro/ /sems g.yeng ba gang dag gis mthong na de dag ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /
shes rab 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag shes rab la mos par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu mdor na sems can dkar po'i chos gang dang gang dag dang bral ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
mthong ba de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad rgyun chad nas dge ba'i sems la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te de la yang de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul pa de
yang lhun gyis 'grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas sprul pa dag sprul to/ /sprul lo/ /sprul par bya'o snyam
du mi dgongs mod kyi 'on kyang sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed par 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong de dang de dag tu sems can yongs su
smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de snyed du bzhud de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas
sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du sku las 'od kha dog du ma/ kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong pa phyung ste/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi
bye ma snyed snang bar byed pa de yang lhun gyis 'grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku'i gsang ba dang / sku'i phrin las te/ sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan du zad kyi bskal pa 'am/ de bas lhag par brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa'i mthar phyin par mi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog
chags khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan
pa'i 'khor des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la lha dang mi'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyag g.yas
pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i spyi bo la bzhag nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa 'di
legs par smras pa legs so legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gnang zhing rjes su dgyes so/ /legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //
gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang / gsung gi phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge'i 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so/ /gsung bar mi
'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dbugs 'byung ba 'am rngub ba mi mnga'o/ /rnam par mi rtog go /
rnam par mi dpyod do/ /rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa med pa na ngag mi 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang rnam par mi rtog /rnam par mi dpyod/ rtog par mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog
par mi mdzad/ mi gsung / mi rjod/ gsung bar mi mdzad kyang sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung ngo snyam mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin du mnyam par
bzhag pa ste/ yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rig par mi mdzad kyang sems can yi ge lhur len pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag
cag la chos ston to/ /bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa kun shes so snyam mo/ /de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms su mdzad do/ /zhi ba'i

blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems dang / sgros dang / zhal gyi rkan dang ljags dang / zhal gyi sgo nas sgra 'byung ba yang med la 'byung bar yang grag go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgra 'byung ba

de ni nam mkha' las 'byung na sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ngo snyam mo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni rnam pa drug bcu

rtsa bzhi dang ldan par 'byung ste/ rnam pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mnyen pa'i gsung 'byung ba dang / 'jam pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du 'thad pa dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa

dang / 'od gsal ba dang / snyan cing 'arjebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / snyan pa dang / dul ba dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / rab tu dul ba dang / rnar snyan pa dang / lus

sim par byed pa dang / sems tshim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' bde skyed pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / kun du shes par bya ba dang / rnam par rig par bya ba dang /

rnam par gsal ba dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang / kun shes par byed pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / rig pa dang 'brel ba dang / zlos pa'i skyon med pa dang / seng

ge'i sgra'i shugs can dang / glang po che'i sgra skad dang / 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang / klu'i dbang po'i sgra dang / dri za'i glu dbyangs dang / bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa dang /

shang shang te'u yi sgra dbyangs su grag pa dang / lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar snyan pa dang / rnga'i sgra dang / ma khengs pa dang / mi dma' ba dang / sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / tshig zur chag pa med pa

dang / ma tshang ba med pa dang / ma zhum pa dang / mi zhan pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / khyab pa dang / chub pa dang / rgyun chags pa dang / 'brel ba dang / sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang / dbang po

thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / ma smad pa dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / ma brtabs pa dang / 'khor kun du grag pa dang / 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang 'dul ba dang gti mug sel ba dang / bdud

tshar gcod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'byung ba ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni yan lag drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan par 'byung ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros
gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang / zhi ba'i blo gros
de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du nga mdo'i sde 'am/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde 'am/ lung bstan pa'i sde 'am/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde 'am/ ched du brjod pa'i sde 'am/ gleng gzhi'i sde 'am/
de lta bu byung ba'i sde 'am/ skyes pa'i rabs kyis sde'am/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde'am/ rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde 'am/ gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde'am/ dpe 'am/ sngon gyi tshul lam/
rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde 'am/ kun du bsnyad pa 'di ston to zhe 'am/ rab tu gsal bar mdzad do zhe'am/ rab tu shes par mdzad do zhe'am/ rab tu 'jog go zhe 'am/ rnam par byed do zhe 'am/ rnam
par 'grel to zhe 'am/ rjod do zhe 'am/ yang dag par bsgrags par mdzad do snyam du mi dgong so/ /de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa ci 'dra ba dge slong gi 'khor ram/ dge slong

ma'i 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ram/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor kyang rung ste/

der de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa dang / de dag ci 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pas dgos par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i thos pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes kyang chos

bstan pa de ni phan tshun gyi nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa la gnod pa med par thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnams par rig pa kun du shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang

ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa dag gi spyod pa tshad med pa gsung na/ sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes 'byung ba ni sems can dbang po mthu
chung ba rnams gzud pa'i phyir bstan pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyi/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gyi sbyong pa ni tshad med de sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams kyi sbyong pa gang yin pa
de bskal pa tsam du bshad kyang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro/ /zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams

kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de dag bskal pa tsam du bstan kyang de dag re re yang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong du bzhugs pas sems
can rnams la chos bstan pa gzhan gyi skabs mi dbye bar sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug par 'gyur gyi/ sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar thug pa gang yang
med do/ /sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug par 'gyur gyi/ sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar
thug pa gang yang med do/ /sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems can gyi spyod pa de tsam du tshad med pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas tshad dang ldan par ston to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de la de
bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji ltar spyod pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba bzhin du sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la 'byung ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /
zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar mi shes kyi nam
mkha' las 'byung bar shes so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes so snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gtsug tor nas byung bar shes pa dang / spyi gtsug nas byung bar shes pa dang / dbu skra rnams las byung bar shes pa dang /

phrag pa nas byung bar shes pa dang / 'phral ba dang / smin mtshams dang / mdzod spu dang / spyan dang snyan dang / shangs dang 'gram pa dang / zhal dang / mgur nas byung bar shes pa dang / de bzhin du dpung

pa dang / phyag dang / sor mo dang / rtsib logs dang / brang dang / rgyab dang / lte ba dang / gsang ba'i gnas dang / brla dang / pus mo'i lha nga dang / byin pa dang / long bu dang / zhabs gyi mthil dang / mtshan
rnams dang / dpe byad bzang po rnams dang / spu'i khung bu thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes pa'i sems can kha cig yod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros mos pa ji lta ba dang / yongs su smin pa ji lta ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes kyang zhi ba'i blo gros de la de
bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sil snyan gyi 'khrul 'khor de tsam du legs par sbyar ba byas pa gang dag la lag

gis ma reg par rlung gis skyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dag kyang yod do/ /'on kyang de la sgra 'byin par spro ba ni gang yang med mod kyi yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i khyad par gyis sgra snyan pa yang 'byung
ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa'i shes pas bskyod na 'byung ste/ 'on kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byin par spro ba yang mi
mnga' mod kyi sngon yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa'i khyad par gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su 'jug par yang 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na brag

cha'i sgra ni gzhan rnam par rig par byed par yang 'byung la de ni nang na yang ma yin/ phyi rol na yang ma yin/ gnyis ga med pa las kyang mi dmigs so zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par rig par byed par yang 'byung la de ni nang na yang ma yin/ phyi rol na yang ma yin la gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/
dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na sems can gang gi bsam

pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i sgra de las 'byung yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rin po che lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag
pa yang snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na sems can gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar des shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs
pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsung dbyangs
tshad med pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi tshad dam mtha' gzung bar nus pa de ni kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa

dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te/ bcom
ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la brten nas dbyangs
kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher rab tu ston pa de mjug tu phyin pa'i dus gyi tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor ji srid cig tu ring du 'gro ba zhig bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor dpag par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas gnas brtan

maud gal gyi bu chen po rang gi stan gyi steng nas mi snang bar gyur te ri rab kyi rtse mor phyin nas de de na 'dug na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de 'dra ba kho nar thos so/ /rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i nub phyogs kyi ri rab las 'das shing gling bzhi pa las kyang 'das khor yug las kyang 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi khor yug gi zom la 'dug na yang
bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung lhag chad med cing mnyam par de 'dra ba kho nar thos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma maud gal gyi bu 'di nga'i sgra skad dpog par 'dod kyis
ngas 'di la rdzu 'phrul bstang ngo snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstangs pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas kyi
zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na de bzhin
gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang ston pa der gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos phyin te/ de na 'dug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra skad
de 'dra ba kho nar thos te/ 'di lta ste dper na 'dom gang tsam gyi phyogs na 'dug pa'i mis mi gcig shos kyi sgra thos pa de bzhin du gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyis khams de na
gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung sgra thos so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku'i khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag
gi lus kyi khrun ni dpag tshad phyed do/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad par bya ba'i lhung bzed kyi rten ma gdu bu de la gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'chag cing 'dug go/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong gi kha dog 'dra ba'i srog chags lhung bzed kyi rten ma gdu bu la 'chag
cing mchis pa 'di ga las mchis pa zhig bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed 'di la brnyas pa'i sems ma skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu
chen po zhes bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog go/ /nyan thos chen po rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag khyad du gsod kyis khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig /de nas gnas brtan maud gal
gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gling 'di skyil
mo dkrung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig /de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la

bdun tsam gyi gong du mngon par 'phags te/ rin po che'i gling de skyil mo dkrung gcig gis khyab par byas so/ /skyil mo dkrung de las kyang mu tig gi rgyan phreng bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par

'phyang ngo / /mu tig gi rgyan phreng gi 'bru thams cad las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ngo / /'od zer de dag thams cad kyi rtse mo dag las kyang pad+ma rnam byung ngo / /pad+ma thams cad kyi snying po rnams la
yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bzhugs par snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te bsngags pa gsung ngo / /de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo dkrung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar stong dang stong gnyis khyab par bgyi'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo dkrung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i
dus la bab par shes na gyis shig /de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de bsdus te bcom ldan 'das gyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ci zhig gi slad du 'jig rten gyi khams
'dir mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das des gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad med pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor
shes par 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyi khyod kyi lan gnyis su de lta bu'i sems ma skyed cig /gal te maud gal gyi bu khyod shugs 'di nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di nyid
kyis nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gyi bskal par song yang khyod kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad med pa dang ldan no/ /de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa bshags
pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal bas bdag ni nongs pa can te nongs pa 'chags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
bdag ji srid cig gnas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/ /
maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ring mo zhig nas mchis pa lus dub ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'chi ba'i rngo mi thog go/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal

pa/ maud gal gyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod ni bcom ldan
'das shAkya thub pa nyid kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyis khyod bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag 'tshol cig dang / de nyid kyis khyod slar khrid par 'gyur ro/ /maud gal gyi
bu gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni bskal pa srid kyis kyang phyin par mi nus te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der ma phyin par bar du yongs su mya ngan las
'da' bar gyur ro/ /maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ shar ram/ lho 'am/ nub bam/ byang ngam phyogs gang zhig tu phyin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag phyogs bslad de gang nas 'dir
mchis pa ma 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi
khams der 'gro na ni bskal pas kyang phyin par mi nus so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhugs/ bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni shar phyogs logs na bzhugs so/ /de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te shar phyogs su phyag
'tshal nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /mthu chen mnga' ba lha dang mis mchod pa/ /ye shes mtha' yas mtha' yas gsung ldan pa/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa
dgongs su gsol/ /slar yang zhing de rab tu mchi bar bgyi/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
gnas pa des gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus gsol ba btab pa'i sgra de thos so/ /thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni maud gal gyi bu ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das par song ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi
zhing na gnas te de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'dod nas gsol ba 'debs pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo / /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das maud gal gyi bu chen po ci'i smad du 'jig rten
gyi khams der mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo maud gal gyi bu 'di slar 'ongs pa dang 'di nyid du thos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten kyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan

maud gal gyi bu chen po blta bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas mdzod spu nas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste 'od zer des sangs

rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed po de dag las thal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur to/ /de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des
'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po yan lag lnga sa la gtugs
te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjes su
'brongs te shog shig /de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te/ sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal
nas nyes pa bshags la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal nas de srid du ring du mchis par bdag nongs pa can te nongs pa
'chags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de srid du ring du mchis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'di na ji tsam pa de tsam lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu chen po
ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshad gang yang med de/ maud gal gyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tshad dam mtha' yongs su tshol bar
sems pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad dam/ mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis khyab bo/ /
gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci mang ba
yin nam/ zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can gcig gi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen por
gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa rnams kyis bskal bar yang bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ rtsi ba 'am/ brtag par mi nus na sems can thams cad kyi lta smos
kyang mi dgos/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod mos par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed par 'di lta ste/ sems can
thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i gsung gi yan lag gi rnam pa yang de snyed du 'byung ste/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing
btang snyoms pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong gsum sems can gang yin pa/ /de dag rang rgyal 'dren gyur pas/ /bskal par sems can gcig gcig gi/ sems kyi khams kyang mi shes
so/ /sems can gcig yid ji snyed pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen kyang / /nga yis yid 'di shes so zhes/ /de ni rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems
pa dag ni ji snyed pa/ 'jig rten mgon po chos ston tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag de snyed do/ /chos kyi bdag po gsung ba na/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag ji snyed pa/ /chos kyi ming gis bshad pa yi/ /chos
bstan pa yang de tsam mo/ /sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni/ /ming dang sems pa ji snyed pa/ /sems can snying po'i spu gcig nas/ /'od zer 'byung ba de snyed do/ /'jig rten dgon po'i spu kun gyis/ /
'od zer dag ni ji snyed pa/ /mi yi dbang po chos ston tshe/ /gsung gi yan lag de bas mang / /dpe bkod nas ni sangs rgyas kyis/ /bskal par rab tu bstan mdzad kyang / /sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung
dbyangs kyi/ /mtha' ma rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs gzugs can ma yin rnams/ /gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis brjod/ /gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis ni/ /nyon mongs gzugs
med zhi bar byed/ /ji ltar tshig ni gzugs med pa/ /thams cad du ni mi dmigs te/ /de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med pa/ /shin du dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar tshig ni yong min te /
nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa/ /de ltar nyon mongs rnams med cing / /nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so/ /ji ltar phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsung / /gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar
nyon mongs mi dmigs kyang / /de ni tshig gis brjod pa yin/ /sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig /rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa/ /de dag lus dang sems mi gnas/ /gnas pa
med pa 'ang ma yin no/ /ji ltar sil snyan 'khrul 'khor byas/ /rlung gis bskyod nas sgra 'byung ba/ /sgra 'byin byed pa gang yang med/ /'on kyang sgra rnams de dag 'byung / /de ltar sngon chad rnams
dag phyir/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pas bskyod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang / /'di la de ni rtog mi mnga'/ /ji ltar brag cha rnams kyi sgra/ /nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa/ / de ltar mi
yi dbang po'i gsung / /nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so/ /ji ltar rin chen mi rtog par/ /snang bas sems can tshim byed pa/ /de ltar rgyal ba mi rtog gsung / /sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed/ /
zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba ni sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo
gros stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na skye ba'i gnas tha dad pa dag yod pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta
ba bzhin du bden pa rnams kyi ming tha dad pa dag gis rnam par gzhag go/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal
'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de sa bla ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ za ba dang / za ba'i rtsa ba dang / za ba sel dang / za ba 'gog byed ces bya'o/ /'dir sdug
bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ bar snang gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jug pa
dang / kun du 'jug byed pa dang / kun du 'jug bral dang / kun du 'jug sgrol zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog
par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'byung ba dang / dpog pa dang / sreg pa dang / 'jig byed ces bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal
dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/
'khor ba dang / kun snyen dang / zad pa dang / zad pa ldog par byed ces bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / /sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par
'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa dang / gnod pa snyen dang / gnod pa zad dang / gnod pa zad par sgom pa zhes bya'o/ /
'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces
bya ste shin du mi srun dang / mi srun rtsa ba dang / ldog pa dang / yang dag par ldog byed ces bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal
'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rkyal pa dang / kun du rkyal byed dang / rkyal zad dang / rkyal zang sgo zhes bya'o/ /
'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'di

skad bya ste/ ha ha ho dang / ha ha thob byed dang / ha ha bral dang / ha ha bral byed ces bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par

'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ me mur dang / me mur gnod dang / me mur 'dor 'dod dang / me mur sgrol zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang /

sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshangs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ sdug pa dang / sdug byed dang /
sdug pa nyal dang / sdug par 'khor zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhe bya ba gang yin pa de
tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'dzag pa dang / kun du 'dzag byed dang / rgyun gcod dang / shin du 'byung zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /
sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rma dang / rma'i mtshams sbyor ba dang /

rma rub dang / rma nye bar zhi byed ces bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshangs

chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rkyal byed dang / rnam par rkyal byed dang / rkyal pa mthar byed dang / byed pa thob byed ces bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /

sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ ha hi dang / he hi dang / hu hu dang / ha ra nu san d+hi zhes bya'o/ /
'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dge chung gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/
o hi ta dang / ni ba hi ta dang / ni ga k+Shi ta dang / ni ga ma ni zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ sten pa dang / yang dag par sten pa dang / zad pa ston pa dang / kun du ston pa zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang /
sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ yongs gcod dang /
yongs gcod 'byung dang / khyim mtha' dang / rtag tu rnam dag ces bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i
lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rjes su 'gro ba dang / mi 'ong ma yin pa dang / rjes kyi mtshams dang / rjes kyi
mtshams 'gro zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog bar 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin
pa de mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag pa dang / dag pa can dang / dag pa yongs dag dang / dag pa 'gro zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun
'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de gya nom snang gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mam ma ma dang /
mam ma me dang / ma na nu ga ma zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par
'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de shin du mthong gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ grol ba dang / grol ba can dang / grol ba'i rtsa ba dang / grol ba'i bye brag phyed par mtshams
sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'bras bu che ba'i
lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi bya ba dang / mi byed pa dang / byed bral dang / byed pa mthar thug ces bya'o/ /'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal
'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mthar thug dang / shin du mthar thug
dang / mi rtog pa dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar ji ltar lha rnams kyi bden pa rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du klu rnams kyi yang
gzhan no/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi yang gzhan no/ /dri za rnam gyi yang gzhan no/ /lha ma yin rnams kyi yang gzhan no/ /nam mkha' lding rnams kyi yang gzhan no/ /mi 'am ci rnam kyi yang
gzhan no/ /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi yang gzhan no/ /gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs rnams kyi yang gzhan no/ /phreng thogs rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa yang gzhan yin no/ /zhi
ba'i blo gros gang yul chen po bcu drug tu bsdu bas bsdus pa'i yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yongs su gang ste/ gang na mi rnams kyi tshig kyang gzhan/ nges pa'i tshig kyang gzhan/ brda
yang tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag rnam par bkod de/ 'di lta ste/ yul ka sha dang / pa hu pa dang /
tho gar yul dang / ya ba na dang / kam po dza dang / kha sha dang / hu na dang / rgya yul dang / da ra ta dang / u ra sha dang / pi lin dang / po ma dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs

dang / dmangs rigs dang / da tsi ba dang / ki ra ta dang / pu lin ta dang / pun dra dang / ku ru na dang / lnga len dang / shar phyogs dang / phu ru ra ba dang / lho phyogs dang / ka ling ka dang / gcer
bu dang / ba na sa ka dang / pa na ta dang / sbal ka dang / khyi gdong dang / lba gdong dang / kri ba sha'i gdong dang / spyi'u tshugs pa dang / gnas gdong po dang / phyi phyogs gdong dang / byang
mtshams gdong dang / rjes su rgyug dang / rgya mtsho khol ba dang / yul mthas gtug pa dang / ang ku ra dang / mang gu ra dang / sna med dang / glo bkra dang / phyogs kyi gcer bu dang / gshog
thogs gcer bu dang / dgus te 'gro dang / rdzogs byed rnam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bar na gnas pa'i yul la sogs pa yul stong gis 'dzam bu gling yongs su gang ste/ zhi ba'i blo
gros gang na mi rnams kyi tshig dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag
bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin zhing / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa 'byung ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros stong gi 'jig rten gyi
khams 'di na bden pa ming tha dad pas bstan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yod de bden pa bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
skyes pa med pa'i bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi bden pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i bden par don gcig tu yang dag par 'dus te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang
ba'o/ / bam po lnga pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi som nyi sel ba'o/ /zhi ba'i
blo gros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi

khams ni ches mang gi sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung nas sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros
sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i shes rab dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu lta bu'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye
shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes de sems can gcig dang ldan par gyur cing rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad shes rab dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ zhi ba'i
blo gros sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par the tsom gyi dri ba bsams shing gzhal te/ yongs su bcal la/ sems can gcig gi the tshom dri ba gang yin
pa de gnyis pa'i ma yin zhing / zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad kyis the tsom gyi dri ba tha dad pa bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du dong nas se gol gtogs pa srid
la the tshom gyi dri ba de dag gsol kyang des sems can gcig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i dran pas thams cad bzung nas gsung brjod pa gcig gis de dag gi the tsom gyi dri ba thams cad gcad de/
de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi the tsom gyi dri ba chad par shes shing bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas thams cad kyang sems rangs par 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod cing sems can thams cad kyi som nyi sel kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la thugs kyis mdzad
pa 'am/ gsung du brjod pa yang mi mnga' la mdzad pa de yang mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /'di ni gsung rmad du byung ba'o/ /'di ni yongs su
dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang gsung gi gsang ba 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bshad pa'i tshe srog chags sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na tshangs par spyad
pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir me tog rnams kyis kyang gtor/ rin po che'i gdugs rnams kyang gtor
ro/ /de nas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la yang phog /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lus la yang phog cing 'khor thams cad la yang 'thor ro/ /rin po che'i gdugs
de dag kyang bar snang la gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na 'dug go/ /rin po che'i gdugs de dag las kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod
ba bgyi ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rmad du byung ba 'di bstan pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rjes su gzung ba'i slad du bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyis btang ba lags so zhes sgra byung ngo / /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed
de/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par
rnyed do/ /gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos shing som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yod pa'i mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur
zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog bar yang 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi
mthun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bstan to/ bsnyad do/ /yang dag par bshad do/ /gang dag chos
bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ring por mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa'i rjes su rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par
'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos
te snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /me tog gi char chen po yang bab pa/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra yang byung ngo / /sems can grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /
byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byas so/ /de nas 'khor gyi khyams de'i dbus

nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyis sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa brtol to mngon du byung bar snang ngo / /de dag steng gi bar snang
nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spos chus chag chag btab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis chu'i rgyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das mthong lags te 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros chu'i rgyun 'di dag sems med kyang ji ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po brtol te mngon
bar 'phags pa de bzhin du gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang mngon par 'phags par gyur te/ de dag ni ma
rig pa dang / lta bar gyur ba'i sgo glegs bcag nas chos kyi snang ba mi zad pa dang / shes rab dang / spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /des skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad pas
sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur te/ 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi
gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi
ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang / thugs kyi phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/
dper na gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris su sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gcig gis bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas kyang ting nge 'dzin
gyi tshe'i mthar ma thug gi bar du de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rjes su mi 'brang ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skye ba yongs
su 'dzin to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang mi gnas pa ste gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la ldog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la rnam par gcod pa mi mnga'/ thugs la
'gyur ba mi mnga'/ thugs kyi tshad mi mnga'/ thugs la 'khrug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la sel ba mi mnga'/ thugs la g.yeng ba mi mnga'/ thugs la khengs pa mi mnga'/ thugs la
dma' ba mi mnga'/ thugs la kun du srung ba mi mnga'/ thugs la rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs la shin du rangs pa mi mnga' thugs la rnam par 'khrug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la 'khon du
'dzin pa mi mnga'/ thugs la g.yo ba mi mnga'/ thugs la nges par sems pa mi mnga'/ thugs la dgyes pa mi mnga'/ thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/ thugs la 'jug pa mi mnga'/
thugs rab tu rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs la rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la yongs su rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la zhi gnas mi mnga'/ thugs la lhag
mthong mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba mi mnga'/ rang gi thugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba mi mnga'/ thugs mig la gnas pa mi mnga'/
thugs rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs gzugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs
chos la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs dmigs pa la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs nang na gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs phyi rol na gnas pa mi mnga'o/ /
thugs de chos rnams la mi 'jug go/ /thugs de ye shes la mi 'jug go/ /thugs de 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung pa la mi rtog go/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs
pa ni de ltar thugs yongs su dag pa ste/ thugs kyis chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la chos thams cad la yang de'i ye shes ma chags ma thogs pa 'jug go/ /rang gi thugs yongs
su dag pas sems can gang gi sems kyang yongs su ma dag par mi gzigs te/ de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par mi rtog go/ /gzigs kyang spros par mi mdzad do/ /
gzigs pas gzigs pa dang rnam par gzigs pa mi gzigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sha'i mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i mig gi mthong ba dang
ldan pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ chos kyi mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi gzigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i rna ba'i
thos pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ma yin/
zag pa zad pa shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin la/ de chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad la chags pa med par ldan pa yin no/ /de'i de bzhin gshegs
pa'i ye shes kyi rgyun rnams ni bsgrim pa mi mnga' zhing lhun gyis grub la mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar gnas so/ /sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la yang
gzigs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa bcwa brgyad mkhyen pa yang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar 'jug go/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang yang bral la ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi 'dor ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad la de'i chos
thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyang gang du yang mi chags so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa gang
yin pa de la ni sems kyang mi mnga'/ yid kyang mi mnga'/ rnam par shes pa yang mi mnga'/ sku'i 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/ gsung gi 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/ thugs kyi 'du byed kyang mi
mnga' mod kyi/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad do/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sprul pa dang mtshungs
pas mnyam mo/ /sprul pa'i chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog go/ /de la sku'i rtsom pa dang / gsung gi rtsom pa dang / thugs kyi rtsom pa yang mi snang la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams
cad kyang mdzad de/ de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i
rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can la thugs brtse bas de bzhin du bstan
to/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po la gnas pa ma yin/ khams la gnas pa
ma yin/ skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi rol la gnas pa ma yin/ dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa la
gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas
pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor
brtags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas pa mi mnga'o/ /de chos
gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la sems can la thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa rnams la yang de'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa mi mnga'
zhing thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'jug ste/ de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go/ /zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba ste mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor la sems can thams cad la sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad pas thugs bsam gyis mi khyab
pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na da ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi slad na yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu bya ba 'di bsam gyi mi
khyab kyis zhog shig /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta mod kyi shA ri'i bu gang dag dad cing dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag gnas 'di la skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la yid ches par
mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mthong lags te/ 'di bdag gis sngon ni nam yang ma mthong ngo / /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni
bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyab rgyab na yang gnas te sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du yang lag
na rdo rje'i gzugs su kun du ston to/ /shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi rgyab rgyab tu/
gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun du bstan kyang des ye shes kyi byin gyi brlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub
sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje 'dug pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da gdod mthong lags te sngon ni ma mthong ngo / /bka' stsal pa/ 'di
ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu gnas na khyod kyis de ma mthong ba ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams
gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
byams pa dang / bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul kyang de dag thams cad kyi rgyab na yang gsang ba pa'i
bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas par snang ste byin gyi brlabs de dag thams cad ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de

dag gi rgyab na yang 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te/ shA ri'i bu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni de ltar ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi
stobs dang ldan no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros
kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud
'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bkod pa bstan pa la brtsams te/ de na rmad du byung ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba gang du khyod la mngon sum du gyur pa la khyod spobs
par gyis shig /gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bkod pa byung ba ni tshad med de de dag ni tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas pas kyang
rgyas par rnam par phye ste bstan par sla ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa ni rnam pa gcig
ma yin te/ mu stegs can gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' spyad do/ /dka' thub dang / lus la yongs su gdung ba ji snyed dang / lus la yongs su gdung ba ji snyed kyis pha rol
mu stegs can dag mngon par snyems pa de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa 'am/ ches mchog tu gyur pa'i bya ba dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub gang dag de dag gis bya bas
kun du bstan par mi nus pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas kun du bstan te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de la kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya cig brtsugs te
'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni lag pa bteg ste 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni nyi ma la lta zhing 'dug par mthong / kha chig gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar mthong / /kha cig
gis ni tsog tsog por 'dug cing spong ba la brtson par mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa btsugs te mi 'gul bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du bsgreng ste 'dug
par mthong / kha cig gis ni khas bub tu 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni tsher ma'i steng na nyal bar mthong / kha cig gis ni ba lang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal bar mthong / kha cig gis
ni rdo leb la skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni brtsig pa la snyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb la snyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni gtun shing la snyes pa dang /
kha cig gis ni phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang / kha cig gis ni nyi ma yongs su sgyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa mun dza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis

ni rtswa bal ba dza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa ku sha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni ri dgas kyi lpags pa gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa tsir gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sgren mor
'dug pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa dar b+ha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig ni shin shun gyi gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sred za ba dang / kha cig gis ni nas za bar mthong

ngo / /kha cig gis ni rtsa ba za ba dang / lo ma za ba dang / me tog za ba dang / 'bras bu za ba dang / sdong bu za ba dang / gzegs ma za ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba za ba dang / zhag drug smyung ba dang / sha

mi za ba dang / rgya shug za ba dang / nas shin te za ba dang / ci tse za ba dang / mon sran sde'u za ba dang / mon sran gre'u za ba dang / bra yos za ba dang / til za ba dang / 'bras skam za ba dang /
chu 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / mar gyi thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / sbrang ci'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / 'o ma'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / kha cig gis ni zas mi
za ba dang / kha cig gis ni gnyid dang bral bar mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni 'dug pa 'ba' shig tu mthong ngo / /kha chig gis ni 'greng ba 'ba' shig tu mthong ngo / /zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang
chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang / dka' ba spyod pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ston te/ lo drug tshang par spyod lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad rdzogs par bstan par
gyur to/ /brtul zhugs shin du khyad par du 'phags pa dang / brtson 'grus shin du sbyangs pa dang / dka' thub shin du brtan pos lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub thams cad
ston kyang sems can gzhan dang gzhan la ma mos pa dag gis brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub gzhan dang gzhan du mi mthong ste/ gzhan du na ci 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub ci 'dra ba
dag gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub mthong ba ni ma gtogs so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du kha
nam tho ba med pa'i btang snyoms can yang yin la bya ba de dag kyang kun du ston te/ dka' ba spyod pa 'dis lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su
smin par byas so/ /zhi ba'i blo gros lha dang / mi gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug
cing mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pad nga / mi g.yo ba dang / bde ba myong ba dang / lo drug lon nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo / /
zhi ba'i blo gros de la lha dang mi chos can 'dod pa chos bstan pas yongs su smin par bya ba gang yin pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan mi byed par rgyun mi 'chad par chos
ston par mthong ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor ba/ ye shes chen po yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bsam gyis
mi khyab pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /bya dka' ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar lo drug tshang nas byang chub
sems dpa' ji skad smos pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub de dag las langs te klung ne ran dza na'i 'gram du song nas 'jig rten dang 'thun par khrus byas te/ lus gtsang mar byas
nas klung ne ran dza na nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to/ /de na grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma zhes bya ba des pa stong gi 'o ma bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i 'o thug khyer te
byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ngo / /gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug
bcu yang rang rang gi zas thogs te 'khod nas so so nas tshig 'di skad tu/ kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig /kye bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig ces
zer ro/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de na byang chub sems dpa' grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma la sogs pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za bye ba phrag drug bcu po de dag thams cad kyi kha
zas de dag blangs nas thams cad zos kyang phan tshun ma mthong ngo / /lha'i bu re res kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bshos gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bshos
gsol nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar shes so/ /de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zas len par sbyor ba dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba'o/ /zas len pa sems
can yongs su smin par byed pa dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te lus stobs dang
ldan par gyur nas zas zos te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ngo / /de song ba dang sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu sa bzangs zhes bya bas sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la bos te smras
pa/ sa 'dzin gang zhig mi g.yo mi bskyod pa/ /sred pas bsal cing khong khro rab spangs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing drung byon/ /sa gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan par bya/ /legs so
zhes te sa la spyod rnam dga'/ /stong gsum thams cad yongs su phyag dar byed/ /me tog sil ma bkram zhing spos mchog bdugs/ /spos chu dag gis sa gzhi chag chag btab/ /lag na
gzhong thogs de bzhin phreng ba thogs/ /gzhal med khang gnas de bzhin bar snang ba/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'/ /de tshe me tog sna tshogs char du phab/ /gling bzhi pa
dag rnams na skyong ba bzhi/ /ji snyed pa dag thams cad 'khor bcas te/ /rnam par 'dren la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gser gyi dra bas stong gsum thams cad bkab/ / stong gsum 'jig
rten brgya byin rdzu 'phrul che/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang mdzes pa/ /de ltas stong gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan/ /'thab
bral lha rnams thams cad rab dga' ste/ /skyes bu mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir/ /mi mjed 'jig rten khams kyi stong gsum kun/ /nam mkha' bai dUr+ya yi dra bas bkab/ /dga'
ldan rab dang dga' ldan lha rnams kyang / /de dag mu tig dra bas brgyan pa byas/ /rgyan phreng de bzhin zla gam rnams kyang thogs/ /mu tig sil ma'i char yang rab tu 'bebs/ /lha'i rgyal
po rab tu 'phrul gyi bar/ /rab tu dga' nas 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi/ /dril bu'i dra ba gser gyi drar bcas dang / sgra snyan bcas pas stong gsum thams cad bkab/ /thams
cad don la mi 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir/ /dbang sgyur dag gis lha yi rin po che/ /rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa/ /'od gsal dri med dra ba gcig kyang sprul/ /klu dang dri za
lto 'phye chen po dang / lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci kun gyis/ /rang rang gnas dang bkod pa rnams kyis ni/ /'dod khams legs par brgyan nas mdzes par byas/ /zhi ba'i blo gros
de nas stong gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong nas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la
smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bsnabs pa/ dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/ go cha sra ba mnabs
pa/ thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las nges par byung ba/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol du byon pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad
la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin du zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa ded dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum
na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po/ rnam par grol ba'i thabs brnyes pa chos kyi rgyal po chen po/ shes rab kyi 'od
chen po gtong ba tog chen po'i rgyal po/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa pad+ma chen po lta bu/ chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma bsnyel pa rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags
pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu/ shin du dri ma med pa/ shin du yongs su dag pa/ shin du dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin
po che chen po dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu 'dul ba dang / bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub bar bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /
chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrag pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos
kyi mig rnam par sbyang pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
bstan par bzhed pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la grogs po dag khyed
byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la spro bar gyis shig / de nas stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed gyi bdag po de yid rab tu dga' nas tshangs
ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang dka' thub bsags pa/ skyes bu chen po dam pa de byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der
bzhud kyis/ de la khyod kyis bkod pa chen po rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad brgyan par gyis shig / de nas tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos des pa/ lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la phan bzhed pa/ /lha dang mi yis mchod pa lha yi lha/ /thub
pa chen po byang chub snying por gshegs/ /sde dang bcas pa'i bdud ni gdul ba dang / thams cad mkhyen kyi ye shes 'tshang rgya dang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bkang
dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mkhas pa seng ge'i sgra chen bsgrag pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos mig yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/ /
'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs/ /phas kyi rgol ba rnams ni tshar gcad dang / sngon gyi dam bcas yongs su bkang ba dang / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir/
'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs/ /legs par thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni/ /sa yi gzhi ni legs par brgyan par bya/ /stong gsum brgyan par gyur la ltos shig kye/ /
'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par gyur pa ltos/ /'dod pa'i khams ni ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin/ /de ltar gzugs kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya/ /tshangs pa rnams ni sems dang legs
so zhes/ /rab tu dga' nas stong gsum brgyan par gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams na bkod snang ba/ /de bas lhag pa'i mchod pa de dag bstan/ /me tog rnams kyis bkang zhing spos kyis
bkang / rin chen rnams kyis mchod cing sil snyan bsgrags/ /tshangs pa la sogs 'og min lha yi rnams/ /rab tu dga' nas stong gsum thams cad kyang / dga' bar 'gyur dang phyag
bya'i 'os su byas/ /rang rang gnas kyi gzhi yang bkod pa byas/ /lha rnams kyis ni gong nas gong du yang / lhag pa lhag pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu bstan/ /lha yi bu mo bye ba drug bcu brgyas/ /
byang chub rdo rje gdan ni brgyan par byed/ /spos chu yis ni kun du chag chag 'debs/ /me tog sna tshogs dag kyang 'thor bar byed/ /sa gzhi dag la rin chen rnams kyang bkram/ /byang chub
snying por rgyan rnams rab tu bstan/ /thams cad tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa/ /de snyed tshad kyi bkod pa 'dir byas gyur/ /zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi snying por
'gro ba na stong gi dbang po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang /
dka' thub rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa sems can gyi mchog skyes bu chen po 'di byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la khyed kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad bkod pa chen po rnams kyis brgyan par gyis shig /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems
can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos des pa/ /phan bzhed 'jig rten don mdzad bdag nyid che/ /de ni blo ngan sde bcas bdud 'dul du/ /shing gi dbang po byang chub drung du bzhud/ /thams cad
'dus te lhan cig 'dong bar bya/ /stong gsum mi mjed 'di ni brgyan par bya/ /'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang / yang dag mchod na bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur/ /tshangs
pa de dag tshig mchog de thos nas/ /stong gsum thams cad ma lus rgyan byed cing / legs par phyags te me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan/ /'jig rten khams ni rin chen rang bzhin
sprul/ /nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi bkod pa dang / bye ba'i gdugs rnams nam mkhar de dag sprul/ /sa la'i shing rnams me tog mchog spras pa/ /dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis
sprul/ /lam gang nas ni drang srong che gshegs pa/ /de ni shing rta bdun bsnams tshad du sprul/ /rin chen gzhi la gser gyi pad+ma bkram/ kha khyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su
bskor/ /brgya byin gyis der bkod pa gang byas pa/ /de dag lha mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong / sum bcu gsum dbang rnam rgyal khang 'dra bar/ /de ltar gling bzhi dag
ni mdzes par brgyan/ /'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul ba dang / gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'og min lha yi rnams/ /stobs dang shugs 'chang thams cad brtson par ni/ /byang chub snying po
dam pa rgyan par byed/ /byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i bar der ni/ /'dod pa'i khams 'dir dkon mchog gang yod pa/ /lha 'am klu 'am mi 'am ci rnams kyi/ /de dag thams cad skad
cig de la bstan/ /phyogs bzhi dag nas lha mo bye ba lhags/ /me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa yis/ /byang chub shing ni mngon du rgyan par byed/ /spos chu yis ni kun du chag chag 'debs/ /
byang chub shing ni legs par brgyan byas te/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum lha yi yongs 'du 'dra/ /lha rnams bye ba dag gis mdzes sprul pa/ /bkod pa de dag tshig gis brjod mi nus/ /zhi ba'i blo
gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na rkang pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od phyung ste 'od des sems can dmyal ba dang /
dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams rgyun bcad do/ /klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba chen pos
khyab par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i bdag po nag pos byang chub sems dpa'i 'od mthong nas / tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas / dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te thams cad dang
ldan pa'i rang gi 'khor la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i 'od/ /gnas 'dir lhang nger gyur pas na/ /kho bo'i lus ni rab tu tshim/ /sems kyang rab tu dga' bar
gyur/ /kho bos sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi/ /ltas bzang mthong ba ltar na ni/ /gdon mi za bar dpa' chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur / /legs par phye ma phreng ba dang / /
spos dang me tog byug pa dang / /gser dang nor bu mu tig dang / /dung dang rgyan phreng mchog rnams dang / /rol mo sil snyan rnam thogs la/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ /ba dan dag

kyang bsgreng byos te/ /ston pa la ni mchod pa bya/ /klu yi rgyal po'i gnas 'di na/ /bzang po'i rgyan rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rab tu dga' ba yis/ /sangs rgyas la ni rim gro bya/ /de nas klu'i rgyal
po nag po chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rang gi gnas nas byung ste spos chus gang ba'i sprin mngon par sprul nas spos chu'i char pa ni 'bebs
klu'i mu tig dang / klu'i me tog gi char ni 'bebs shing klu'i mthu chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas byang chub
sems dpa' la mchod pa byas te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas rol mo dang / sil snyan len pa dang / bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mngon
par bstod do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ skyes bu mchog gi 'od ni rab bkye bas/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad snang bar gyur/ /skad cig de la ngan song gsum yang zhi/ /nag po'i
